title: Brooch, 2011-42-1, 2007
medium: Gold beads, egg shell (support: grey mother-of-pearl on white gold, 9 round diamonds: 0.26 ct)
markings:
Stamped on reverse of clip:  VCA 750 / CL 42401 (serial number)
On reverse, lower left wing, Japanese cypher(?) in red trapesoidal lozenge
provenance: Van Cleef & Arpels, exhibited in Set in Style: The Jewelry of Van Cleef & Arpels
creditline: Gift of Van Cleef and Arpels
description: Abstract butterfly form comprising simple, curved body studded with small diamonds, flanked by wings with mother-of-pearl and egg shell decoration depicting stylized ocean waves in tones of gold, brown, black and white.
